Programming

  • Languages - (in order of familiarity)
    • Python - with packages like Django and NumPy
    • JavaScript - with Node and npm
    • Java, C - basic familiarity with these guys
  • Algorithms & Datastructures
    • Favourite datastructure - Binomial Heap
    • Favourite paradigm - Divide & Conquer
  • Computer Vision - Took a 4th year course on this topic and really enjoyed it! I love how you can almost directly apply math on images and get meaningful results.
  • Full Stack - From the Linux server to the CSS framework, I worked on every part of a web application.
  • Linux - managing databases and firewalls on the server, also general ease at the command line.
  • Databases - Designed and maintained PostgreSQL DBs. Some experience with NoSQL (MongoDB).
  • Docker - Set up a unified development environment for a team using containers.
  • Git - No other way to write code. Check out my GitHub!

Life Skills

  • Math - I happen to be pretty good at this and enjoy it too! (Award on experience page.)
  • Fast Learner - The trick, the ability to effictively skim results on Google and Stack Overflow.
  • Hard Working - People sometimes ask if I'm a morning person or a night person. I reply "a person person".
  • Good Communicator - I actually think I'm just a good listener, but often this is enough to pass as a good communicator.

Other Skills & Interests

  • Hebrew - The lingua franca of Jews everywhere. Able to hold a casual conversation.
  • Jewish Studies - Delving into Judaism's laws and meaning is a daunting yet rewarding endeavor.
  • Aspiring Bookbinder - I really want to pick this up, but don't yet have any books to bind.
